text: Magaalol marak inki magaalah maray yeemeneeh iimaan yinfiqe mayan, digaala keenil obtak naharal, Nabii Yuunus mara akke waytek, tokkel usun digaalá keenil obtam yismiten waqdi yeemeneeniih Yallal gacen, tokkel ken xixxibissa digaala fayya keenik hayne addunyâ manol, qumri keenik edde yamurruqe waktî fanah ken hatkisne
